data.title: Top 20 Cincinnati News Websites (City in Ohio) in 2024
data.meta_description: Cincinnati News Websites list. Get the latest Cincinnati news, sports, business, opinion, analysis, reviews much more by following top Cincinnati News sites
data.meta_site_name: FeedSpot for Journalists, Editors and Reporters
data.text:
1. Cincinnati Enquirer

Enquirer Media has been providing news, sports and entertainment coverage in Greater Cincinnati for 174 years. Breaking Cincinnati news, traffic, weather and local headlines from The Cincinnati Enquirer newspaper.

Media Outlet cincinnati.com

Facebook Followers 185.2KTwitter Followers 152.4KInstagram Followers 86K Frequency 30 posts / year Domain Authority 82 Get Media Outlets ContactsGet access to 25k active journalists, reporters, editors and media contacts in 1500 niche categories.Get targeted media contact list in your niche at your fingertips so you can focus on running your campaign.Email us the categories of media outlet contacts you want to reach out for your marketing campaign at anuj@feedspot.com Copy email. We'll share active media list with verified email contacts in an Excel or CSV format.Email us

2. WLWT

WLWT.com is leading the way with Cincinnati breaking news, weather and important local news coverage. Look to WLWT for political coverage, viral videos and more from Cincinnati's NBC affiliate.

Media Outlet wlwt.com

Facebook Followers 877.2KTwitter Followers 174.2K Frequency 15 posts / day Domain Authority 79

3. WCPO 9

Get Local News, National News, Video, Government and Politics News, Business News, Crime and Justice News, Education News, Health News, Ohio News, Kentucky News, US and World News, Obituaries, Traffic, Sports, Cincinnati, Ohio, Northern Kentucky, Indiana, WCPO 9 News on WCPO.com

Media Outlet wcpo.com

Facebook Followers 341.3KTwitter Followers 218.8KInstagram Followers 44.1K Frequency 30 posts / day Domain Authority 82

4. Soapbox Cincinnati

An online publication about the people and places moving Cincinnati forward with news about tech, entrepreneurship, arts, innovation, neighborhood development news and more.

Media Outlet soapboxmedia.com

Facebook Followers 8.6KTwitter Followers 13.7KInstagram Followers 2.3K Frequency 7 posts / week Domain Authority 49

5. Cincinnati CityBeat

CityBeat Cincinnati provides updates on the latest News, Voice, Music, Arts & Culture, News, Food & Drink.

Media Outlet citybeat.com

Facebook Followers 88.4KTwitter Followers 50KInstagram Followers 122.5K Domain Authority 63

6. WVXU

91.7 WVXU connects you to a world of ideas with NPR, local news from our award-winning news team, and music/entertainment programs heard only on public radio. WVXU keeps you up to date on current happening 24/7 in Cincinnati.

Media Outlet wvxu.org

Facebook Followers 14.5KTwitter Followers 25.8K Domain Authority 73

7. Cincinnati Magazine

Cincinnati Magazine is the definitive guide to living well in Greater Cincinnati, connecting sophisticated, educated readers with the region's most interesting people, cultural issues, food, arts, fashion, news and history via print, digital, and events.

Media Outlet cincinnatimagazine.com

Facebook Followers 36.2KTwitter Followers 43.8KInstagram Followers 51.9K Frequency 2 posts / week Domain Authority 59

8. CW Cincinnati

Keep up-to-date with all local Weather, Sports, Entertainment, and Community news with the CW news portal. CW Cincinnati is a leading local news channel that provides news and entertainment programming from the CW network in the Cincinnati, Ohio area.

Media Outlet cwcincinnati.com

Facebook Followers 2K Frequency 4 posts / week Domain Authority 19

9. WSTR Star64

STAR64 is Cincinnati's 'My Network' affiliate and premier television entertainment destination. We also have a strong online presence where we provide additional news content concerning the Weather, Entertainment scene, and Community in Cincinnati. Check out our feed to keep track of the latest developments.

Media Outlet star64.tv

Frequency 2 posts / week Domain Authority 31

10. Local 12

Local12.com is the digital channel for Local 12 News Network, providing in-depth coverage of local, national, and international news stories, with a strong focus on sports, weather, and traffic updates. Local 12 News is based in Cincinnati, Ohio, and is affiliated with CBS.

Media Outlet local12.com

Facebook Followers 549.8KTwitter Followers 217.2KInstagram Followers 74.9K Frequency 3 posts / week Domain Authority 71

11. Cincinnati Business Courier

At the Cincinnati Business Courier, you'll find the latest breaking business news, updated throughout the day, this week's top stories from the Cincinnati Business Courier, and other popular features from the print edition. The CBC is part of American City Business Journals, a national publishing company operating a number of Local Business Journals.

Media Outlet bizjournals.com

Facebook Followers 23KTwitter Followers 29.7KInstagram Followers 6.2K Domain Authority 92

12. FOX19 NOW

Catch live updates, photos, and videos on trending topics from the Fox19 staff online. Owned by Gray Television, FOX19 NOW serves the Greater Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Tri-State with breaking news, severe weather coverage, local and national headlines, stories that people are talking about, and more.

Media Outlet fox19.com

Facebook Followers 324.8KTwitter Followers 140.2KInstagram Followers 36.2K Frequency 10 posts / week Domain Authority 81

13. Spectrum News Â» Cincinnati

Stay connected to Cincinnati with all of the local news that matters to the local community. Get breaking news, weather alerts, live streaming video, and more. Spectrum News 1 is a 24-hour local news channel that delivers local news, politics, features, and weather updates live through TV and online on this site.

Media Outlet spectrumnews1.com

Facebook Followers 15.6KTwitter Followers 5.2KInstagram Followers 3.1K Frequency 1 post / week Domain Authority 66

14. 700WLW

Cincinnati's News Radio 700WLW online produces dynamic news stories that continually update readers on the latest goings-on in the city. Discover live weather news, as well as articles covering Sports, Politics, and other off-beat topics on our website.

Media Outlet 700wlw.iheart.com

Facebook Followers 60.1KTwitter Followers 61.3KInstagram Followers 2.2K Frequency 3 posts / week Domain Authority 58

15. The Cincinnati Herald

The Cincinnati Herald is the leading source of Black news in Cincinnati and Southwest Ohio, offering comprehensive coverage of local and national issues. Founded in 1955, the publication addresses topics such as health, entertainment, politics, sports, and community events. It aims to keep its readers informed and engaged with timely and relevant content, making it an essential resource for the Black community. The Herald is known for its commitment to highlighting stories that matter, with a focus on empowerment and representation.

Media Outlet thecincinnatiherald.com

Facebook Followers 6.5KTwitter Followers 3.8KInstagram Followers 2.6K Frequency 2 posts / day Domain Authority 43

16. The News Record

The News Record is the independent student news organization of the University of Cincinnati. Bringing you all of the top stories in news, sports, entertainment and more, you can get all of the campus information you need.

Media Outlet newsrecord.org

Facebook Followers 2.8KTwitter Followers 5KInstagram Followers 1.5K Frequency 4 posts / week Domain Authority 56

17. Jewish Federation Cincinnati

The Jewish Federation of Cincinnati is the backbone organization that catalyzes our community in common purpose. We may come from different places and express our Jewishness in different ways, but we are unified in our vision to build a flourishing, diverse Jewish community for future generations. Explore what's going on at the Federation, stories of how you help, special announcements, events, and more.

Media Outlet blog.jewishcincinnati.org

Facebook Followers 4.6KInstagram Followers 1.8K Frequency 1 post / week Domain Authority 39
